item.description:
Eddie Speed presents
"Note School: Alternative Financing for Today’s Economy"
What You Will Learn:
  • Four key profit centers for seller finance specialist
  • Offering a consulting service helping real estate agents create loans for the large amount of “just missed” buyers who can’t qualify for conventional loans
  • How to maximize the value of a seller financed transaction
  • The minimum credit to consider when offering seller financing
  • How much down payment is enough
  • What verifications you absolutely must obtain from your buyer
  • Who and how you must comply with SAFE Act and Federal disclosure laws: TILA and RESPA
  • How to purchase notes—without investing a dime of your own money
  • How to enrich your own portfolio with income-producing assets that will last for generations
  • How to get real estate deals to come to you
  • And much, much more!

    All Day Seminar
    8:30 AM, Saturday, February 19, 2010

    Doubletree Suites, 400 Soldiers Field Road, Boston, MA

    $49 for members; $99 for nonmembers; $149 day of event

    free parking

    To register, visit www.bostonareia.com

group.name: The Boston Area Real Estate Investors Association

item.name: All Day Seminar - Eddie Speed: Note School
